pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.11 Spell Bows $(li)Adds the Enchanter's Bow and Augment Arrows$(li)Fell spell has been added - takes the tree chopping behaviors of Harvest.$(li)Fell can now harvest cactus, mushrooms, melons, pumpkins, and more!$(li)New Book models and GUI$(li)Various crash fixes with Carbuncles and Cut$(li)Several bug fixes with Fortune in the offhand or on turrets
